title: Expected weather along the Japan Sea coast

content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Radio news broadcast (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What kind of weather is expected along the Japan Sea coast?

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
